QGIS algorithm v.net.components

Source: R/grass7_v_net_components.R
grass7_v_net_components.Rd

QGIS Algorithm provided by GRASS v.net.components (grass7:v.net.components)

grass7_v_net_components(
  input = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  points = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  threshold = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  method = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  arc_column = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  arc_backward_column = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  node_column = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  .a = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  output = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  output_point = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  GRASS_REGION_PARAMETER = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  GRASS_SNAP_TOLERANCE_PARAMETER = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  GRASS_MIN_AREA_PARAMETER = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  GRASS_OUTPUT_TYPE_PARAMETER = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  GRASS_VECTOR_DSCO = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  GRASS_VECTOR_LCO = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  GRASS_VECTOR_EXPORT_NOCAT = qgisprocess::qgis_default_value(),
  ...,
  .complete_output = TRUE
)

Arguments

input

source - Input vector line layer (network). Path to a vector layer.

points

source - Centers point layer (nodes). Path to a vector layer.

threshold

number - Threshold for connecting centers to the network (in map unit). A numeric value.

method

enum of ("weak", "strong") - Type of components. Number of selected option, e.g. '1'. Comma separated list of options, e.g. '1,3'.

arc_column

field - Arc forward/both direction(s) cost column (number). The name of an existing field. ; delimited list of existing field names.

arc_backward_column

field - Arc backward direction cost column (number). The name of an existing field. ; delimited list of existing field names.

node_column

field - Node cost column (number). The name of an existing field. ; delimited list of existing field names.

.a

boolean - Add points on nodes. 1 for true/yes. 0 for false/no. Original algorithm parameter name: -a.

output

vectorDestination - Network_Components_Line. Path for new vector layer.

output_point

vectorDestination - Network_Components_Point. Path for new vector layer.

GRASS_REGION_PARAMETER

extent - GRASS GIS 7 region extent. A comma delimited string of x min, x max, y min, y max. E.g. '4,10,101,105'. Path to a layer. The extent of the layer is used..

GRASS_SNAP_TOLERANCE_PARAMETER

number - v.in.ogr snap tolerance (-1 = no snap). A numeric value.

GRASS_MIN_AREA_PARAMETER

number - v.in.ogr min area. A numeric value.

GRASS_OUTPUT_TYPE_PARAMETER

enum of ("auto", "point", "line", "area") - v.out.ogr output type. Number of selected option, e.g. '1'. Comma separated list of options, e.g. '1,3'.

GRASS_VECTOR_DSCO

string - v.out.ogr output data source options (dsco). String value.

GRASS_VECTOR_LCO

string - v.out.ogr output layer options (lco). String value.

GRASS_VECTOR_EXPORT_NOCAT

boolean - Also export features without category (not labeled). Otherwise only features with category are exported. 1 for true/yes. 0 for false/no.

...

further parameters passed to qgisprocess::qgis_run_algorithm()

.complete_output

logical specifing if complete out of qgisprocess::qgis_run_algorithm() should be used (TRUE) or first output (most likely the main) should read (FALSE). Default value is TRUE.

Details

Outputs description

  • output - outputVector - Network_Components_Line

  • output_point - outputVector - Network_Components_Point
